When you%0D%0Aare ready for marriage and your match is found, your nikah has to be%0D%0Aperformed as soon as possible. If you have a problem with this, you should fast%0D%0Aconstantly to appease and control your desires.%0D%0A%0D%0AYou say you are still studying.
